00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Collections.Generic;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.CSV
00029 {
00033     public class Row
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00040         public Row()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Row(string Content)
00049         {
00050             Regex TempSplitter = new Regex("(?<Value>\"(?:[^\"]|\"\")*\"|[^,\r\n]*?)(?<Delimiter>,|\r\n|\n|$)");
00051             MatchCollection Matches = TempSplitter.Matches(Content);
00052             bool Finished = false;
00053             foreach (Match Match in Matches)
00054             {
00055                 if (!Finished)
00056                 {
00057                     Cells.Add(new Cell(Match.Groups["Value"].Value));
00058                 }
00059                 Finished = string.IsNullOrEmpty(Match.Groups["Delimiter"].Value) || Match.Groups["Delimiter"].Value== "\r\n" || Match.Groups["Delimiter"].Value == "\n";
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00063         #endregion
00064 
00065         #region Public Properties
00066 
00067         private List<Cell> _Cells = new List<Cell>();
00068 
00072         public List<Cell> Cells
00073         {
00074             get { return _Cells; }
00075             set { _Cells = value; }
00076         }
00077 
00083         public Cell this[int Position]
00084         {
00085             get { return _Cells[Position]; }
00086             set { _Cells[Position] = value; }
00087         }
00088 
00092         public int NumberOfCells
00093         {
00094             get { return Cells.Count; }
00095         }
00096 
00097         #endregion
00098 
00099         #region Public Overridden Functions
00100 
00105         public override string ToString()
00106         {
00107             StringBuilder Builder=new StringBuilder();
00108             string Seperator="";
00109             foreach (Cell CurrentCell in Cells)
00110             {
00111                 Builder.Append(Seperator).Append(CurrentCell);
00112                 Seperator = ",";
00113             }
00114             Builder.Append(System.Environment.NewLine);
00115             return Builder.ToString();
00116         }
00117 
00118         #endregion
00119     }
00120 }
